content: cotton tote bag skill level easy size approx 9 deep x 24 around materials light worsted-weight cotton in one or two colors or more sample shown in tahki cotton classic 540 yds scraps of novelty scarf yarn or pony beads for trim optional size us g/6 4 25 mm crochet hook or size needed to achieve gauge tapestry needle gauge 4 sts = 1 9 row = 2 in single_crochet woven pattern on size us g/6 4 25 mm hook stitches/terms beginning beg chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet stitch st 1 pattern notes change colors as desired for 2-color or multicolor tote special stitches for disappearing loop beginning wrap yarn once or twice around index finger insert hook into loops on finger yo and pull loop through chain 1 and begin working 6 single_crochet over strands on finger when several rounds have been completed pull beginning yarn tail to close center of ring tote bag beginning at center of tote bottom chain 4 join into ring or use magic disappearing loop method to begin chain 1 6 single_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch 6 single_crochet round 1 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet 2 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch 12 single_crochet round 2 and all even rounds work even join with slip_stitch at end of each round round 3 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet 2 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 5 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 36 single_crochet round 7 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 48 single_crochet round 9 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 60 single_crochet round 11 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 72 single_crochet round 13 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 84 single_crochet round 14 work 1 round even join with slip_stitch 84 single_crochet round 15 single_crochet in back loop only blo of ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch 84 rnds 16-17 work even join with slip_stitch at end of ea round 84 begin single_crochet woven pattern round 18 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet work single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 row below *single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 row below repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 84 round 19
